summary: This is an email correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting the sealed indictment and arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein. It marks the formal legal action leading to Epstein's 2019 arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the sealed indictment and arrest warrant attached to the email.

events.title: Transmission of Sealed Indictment and Arrest Warrant
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends the sealed indictment and arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein via email.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A sealed indictment and arrest warrant for Jeffrey Epstein were prepared and transmitted on July 2, 2019.
The documents were sent by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The correspondence indicates formal federal criminal charges were being filed against Epstein.
